          <h2>
           Resources by Course

         </div>

           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24094433">
              <a id="link_24094433" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/artsnewyork" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24094433,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24094433}); ">
               Arts Scene of New York
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">

             </li>
             <li id="link25585491">
              <a id="link_25585491" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/manhoodtrial" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25585491,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25585491}); ">

              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">

             <li id="link12717151">

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10462680">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10462680">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10462680">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10462680">
          <div id="boxatt10462680" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12717451">
              <a id="link_12717451" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://universitypublishingonline.org/cambridge/histories/ebook.jsf?bid=CBO9780511780967" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717451,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717451}); ">
               Cambridge History of African American Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The first major twenty-first century history of four hundred years of black writing, The Cambridge History of African American Literature presents a comprehensive overview of the literary traditions, oral and print, of African-descended peoples in the United States.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23458675">
              <a id="link_23458675" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://universitypublishingonline.org/cambridge/histories/subject_title_list.jsf?seriesCode=CHACL&amp;heading=The+Cambridge+History+of+African+and+Caribbean+Literature&amp;tSort=title+closed&amp;aSort=author+default_list&amp;ySort=year+default_list" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23458675,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23458675}); ">
               Cambridge History of African and Caribbean Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This history offers new perspectives on African and Caribbean literature. It provides the general coverage and specific information expected of a major history. Chapters address the literature itself, the practices and conditions of its composition, and its complex relationship with African social and geopolitical history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12717455">
              <a id="link_12717455" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://universitypublishingonline.org/cambridge/histories/subject_title_list.jsf?seriesCode=CHAM&amp;heading=The+Cambridge+History+of+American+Literature&amp;tSort=title+closed&amp;aSort=author+default_list&amp;ySort=year+default_list" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717455,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717455}); ">
               Cambridge History of American Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A compelling evaluation of both the literary importance of early American history and the historical value of early American literature.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12717136">
              <a id="link_12717136" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://universitypublishingonline.org/cambridge/histories/subject_title_list.jsf?seriesCode=CHAT&amp;heading=Cambridge+History+of+American+Theatre&amp;tSort=title+closed&amp;aSort=author+default_list&amp;ySort=year+default_list" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717136,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717136}); ">
               Cambridge History of American Theatre
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Cambridge History of American Theatre is an authoritative and wide-ranging history of American theatre in all its dimensions, from theatre building to play writing, directors, performers, and designers.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12717137">
              <a id="link_12717137" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://universitypublishingonline.org/cambridge/histories/subject_title_list.jsf?seriesCode=CHBT&amp;heading=The+Cambridge+History+of+British+Theatre&amp;tSort=title+closed&amp;aSort=author+default_list&amp;ySort=year+default_list" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717137,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717137}); ">
               Cambridge History of British Theatre
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Cambridge History of British Theatre is an authoritative and wide-ranging history of British theatre in all its dimensions, from theatre building to play writing, directors, performers, and designers. Engaging the theatre as a performance art, a cultural institution, and a fact of British social and political life, the History recognizes changing styles of presentation and performance and addresses the economic context that conditions the drama presented.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12717567">
              <a id="link_12717567" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://histories.cambridge.org/uid=1931/book?id=chol9780521883061_CHOL9780521883061" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717567,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717567}); ">
               Cambridge History of English Poetry
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Poetry written in English is uniquely powerful and suggestive in its capacity to surprise, unsettle, shock, console, and move. The Cambridge History of English Poetry offers sparklingly fresh and dynamic readings of an extraordinary range of poets and poems from Beowulf to Alice Oswald.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12717554">
              <a id="link_12717554" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://histories.cambridge.org/uid=1931/book?id=chol9780521194952_CHOL9780521194952" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717554,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717554}); ">
               Cambridge History of the English Novel
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Cambridge History of the English Novel chronicles an ever-changing and developing body of fiction across three centuries. An interwoven narrative of the novel's progress unfolds in more than fifty chapters, charting continuities and innovations of structure, tracing lines of influence in terms of themes and techniques, and showing how greater and lesser authors shape the genre.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link18508858">
              <a id="link_18508858" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(18508858,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23637531">
              <a id="link_23637531" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=DLBC" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23637531,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22516376}); ">
               Dictionary of Literary Biography Complete Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides authoritative biographical and critical essays on the lives, works, and careers of the world's most influential literary figures from all eras and genres.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23464671">
              <a id="link_23464671" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/content/title/edinburghmct" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23464671,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23464671}); ">
               The Edinburgh Encyclopaedia of Modern Criticism and Theory
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A single volume guide to the history and development of modern criticism in the humanities.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23657236">
              <a id="link_23657236" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1PCW" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23657236,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23657236}); ">
               Gale Contextual Encyclopedia of American Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Covers American authors from many periods and genres, building a broad understanding of the various contexts - from the biographical to the literary to the historical - in which literature can be viewed.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23657241">
              <a id="link_23657241" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/2AEU" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23657241,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23657241}); ">
               Gale Contextual Encyclopedia of World Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Covers world authors from many periods and genres, building an understanding of the various contexts -- from the biographical to the literary to the historical -- in which literature can be viewed. Identifies the significant literary devices and global themes that define a writer's style and place the author in a larger literary tradition as chronicled and evaluated by critics over time.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12717531">
              <a id="link_12717531" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://universitypublishingonline.org/cambridge/histories/subject_title_list.jsf?seriesCode=NCHE&amp;heading=The+New+Cambridge+History+of+English+Literature&amp;tSort=title+closed&amp;aSort=author+default_list&amp;ySort=year+default_list" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717531,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717531}); ">
               New Cambridge History of English Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The New Cambridge History of English Literature offers a masterful discussion of English literature in seven volumes, spanning the early medieval era through the twentieth century.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24870246">
              <a id="link_24870246" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oed.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24870246,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'English', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20417751}); ">
               OED Online (Oxford English Dictionary)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (via library subscription)
               <br />
               The premier source for history of words in the English language, available via library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">

       <div class="roundbox outerbox">

            </h2>
           </td>
          </tr>

             </a>
             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Kelly Cannon
             </div>
